channel.title: Does the open source version of Redash have a driller feature?
channel.description: Does the open source version of Redash have a drill down feature?

item.title: Does the open source version of Redash have a driller feature?
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
I assume you mean an automated drill down feature. No.

Manual drill down is possible using the “Link” column type in table visualisations. Example here. There’s also this PR which brings the linking feature into the chart visualisation. But this won’t automatically index your data and write aggregation queries for you.

Read full topic
item.source: Does the open source version of Redash have a driller feature?
